summary: A texture replacer for the buckets.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
I originally created these textures for my own, because I wasn't so happy with the Vanilla one and couldn't find a re-texture that I like.
Available in [color=#6aa84f]1K[/color]. I also added an Environment Mask and Cubemap for the metal parts. Therefor I had to edit the nif-files, which are included with the download.[/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/U3NUgn1.gif[/img][/center]
author: SkyrimFantom

files.name: Buckets
files.changelogHtml:
iNeed Patch 1.1

1.2
- LoadScreenSmith01.nif and practicedummy02.nif added. Both meshes now use my textures and Cubemap too

1.1
- Cubemap added

1.0
- Release
